import React from 'react'; import './Card.css' import Reveal from 'react-reveal/Reveal'; import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; import {Video, App, showodel} from './../App.js' const Card = ({ name, email, id }) => { return (
{name}
3rd year,CSE dept.
{email}
); } export default Card;
